params.amount: The amount of tokens desired to be distributed.

params.indexId: Id of the index. The subscription should not exist yet. # App callbacks - AgreementUpdated callback to the publisher:    - agreementId is for the subscription

params.amount: The amount of tokens desired to be distributed. NOTE: - This is a convenient version of updateIndex. It adds to the index   a delta that equals to `amount / totalUnits`. - The actual amount distributed could be obtained via   `calculateDistribution`. This is due to precision error with index   value and units data range. # App callbacks None

_MAX_NUM_SUBS.details: Maximum number of subscriptions a subscriber can have

_PUBLISHER_DEPOSIT_STATE_SLOT_ID.details: Publisher state slot id for storing its deposit amount

_SUBSCRIBER_SUBS_BITMAP_STATE_SLOT_ID.details: Subscriber state slot id for storing subs bitmap

_SUBSCRIBER_SUB_DATA_STATE_SLOT_ID_START.details: Subscriber state slot id starting ptoint for subscription data

_UNALLOCATED_SUB_ID.details: A special id that indicating the subscription is not approved yet
